      • getPreviewSize

        public static android.hardware.Camera.Size getPreviewSize(int cameraId)
        Helper method to query the largest supported preview resolution. In this example we simply select the largest resolution to be used with the engine. In real-cases, one should check what resolution is the best for the application.
        Parameters:
        cameraId - Camera id (i.e. 0 - back, 1 - front)
        Returns:
        Largest supported preview resolution for specific camera

      • unbindReferences

        public static void unbindReferences(android.app.Activity activity,
                    int viewID)
        Removes the reference to the activity from every view in a view hierarchy (listeners, images etc.). This method should be called in the onDestroy() method of each activity
        Parameters:
        viewID - normally the id of the root layout

        see http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=8488
